form.IN:
Could
je lahko tudi preteklik glagola
can
.
V tem slovarju besedi obravnavamo ločeno.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
could do something
, je bil zmožen nekaj storiti.

seg.quote: They complained that they couldn't sleep.
When I was young you could buy a packet for two shillings.

sense.def:
Could
uporabljamo v odvisnem govoru, da povemo, ali je nekdo rekel, da je nekaj dovoljeno ali mogoče.

seg.quote: I asked if we could somehow get a car.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
could happen
, je mogoče, da se bo nekaj zgodilo, ali je tisto mogoče storiti. Kadar nekaj
could have happened
, je bilo nekaj mogoče, vendar se v resnici ni zgodilo.

seg.quote: The river could easily overflow, couldn't it?
We could do a great deal more in this country to educate people.
If one could measure this sort of thing, one might understand it better.
You were lucky. It could have been awful.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
could be the case
, je mogoče tako. Kadar nekaj
could have been the case
, je bilo mogoče tako v preteklosti.

seg.quote: It could be a symbol, couldn't it?

sense.def:
Besedo
could
uporabljamo za dajanje predlogov.

seg.quote: Couldn't you just build more factories?
I could ask her, I suppose.

sense.def:
Could
uporabljamo tudi v vljudnih prošnjah.

seg.quote: Could you just switch the projector on?
Could we put this fire on?
Could I speak to Sue, please?
